meanings.definition: The joint between the thigh and the lower leg in humans.
meanings.sent1: She fell and hurt her knee.
meanings.sent2: He wore shorts that showed his knee.
meanings.sent3: The knee of the pants ripped when he tried to do a high kick.
meanings.sent4: The knee of the bridge connected the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent5: The doctor examined her knee carefully to check for any injuries.

meanings.definition: A part of a garment covering the knee.
meanings.sent1: Her dress had a pretty lace knee.
meanings.sent2: He wore pants with reinforced knees for protection.
meanings.sent3: The knee of the jeans had a stylish patch sewn on.
meanings.sent4: The knee of the sock was worn out from constant kneeling.
meanings.sent5: She felt the cold wind on her bare knee as she walked outside.

meanings.sent1: He tried to knee the ball into the goal.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally kneed him in the stomach during the dance.
meanings.sent3: He kneeled down to tie his shoe and almost kneed his own face.
meanings.sent4: The boxer expertly kneed his opponent in the ribs.
meanings.sent5: She kneeled on the ground and kneed the door closed with her foot.
